testcase.name: Getir basket verification
testcase.system-out: Given User open the getir app and enters "hello@getir.com" and "hello"......passed Then User login successfully................................................passed And User clicks basket button...............................................passed Then User verify that basket is empty and able to see "There is no result"..passed Then User able to see all menu list in console and verify that size is 12...passed And User clicks second category which is "Atıştırmalık".....................passed And User adds two different items...........................................passed And User scroll down to "Ürün 14"...........................................passed And User adds two different items...........................................passed And User clicks basket button...............................................passed Then User verify that "Total Amount : 84 ₺".................................passed
